title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 837.5 - Assessment of a penalty
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 837.5 - Assessment of a penalty

State Regulations

The executive director may recommend to the commission the
amount of the penalty to be imposed. Such a recommendation shall be in writing
and shall set forth the basis for the penalty amount proposed. Based upon the
record submitted to the commission, the commission shall decide whether a
violation has occurred that justifies the imposition of a penalty pursuant to
section 14.17 of the Compact. If it is found that such a violation has
occurred, the commission shall determine the amount of the penalty to be
paid. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
837.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
